description._content: Title: [Barnard's Photographic Views of the Sherman Campaign, back cover] Creator: Barnard, George N. Date: 1866 Part Of: Photographic views of Sherman's campaign, from negatives taken in the field Place: Columbia, South Carolina Related Resources: digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/ref/collection/civ/id/435 Physical Description: 42 x 52 File:vault_folio_2_e470_b24_portfolio_65_sm_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu. For more information, see: digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm/ref/collection/civ/id/496 View Civil War: Photographs, Manuscripts, and Imprints digitalcollections.smu.edu/all/cul/civ/
